short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comment ads, share your opinion and read valuable information for particular ad

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to comment on specific listings and share your opinions or insights. Please note that comments reflect the personal views of users and may be inaccurate or misleading.

1. Open a listing on one of the supported pages.
2. Next to the icon, you'll see the number of comments on the listing. If you have an opinion about the product for sale, you can share it by writing a comment, or simply read comments from others.

Supported pages:

 mobile.de
 autoplius.lt
 autogidas.lt
 autoasas.lt
 aruodas.lt
 skelbiu.lt
